name: P521
desc: An elliptic curve that enables NIST P-521 signatures and key agreement.

items.name: enum P521.KeyAgreement
items.desc: A mechanism used to create a shared secret between two users by performing NIST P-521 elliptic curve Diffie Hellman (ECDH) key exchange.

items.name: enum P521.Signing
items.desc: A mechanism used to create or verify a cryptographic signature using the NIST P-521 elliptic curve digital signature algorithm (ECDSA).
